channel.title: Need A Bit Of Help Please. [ Anyone please ]
channel.description:
Okay I got a little problem. I made a server and I edited it and eevrything, Now I need to comile it. BUT, It said I need Java 6.0. So I went and downloaded it. No again I went to Compile it and again, I got an error it said I ddin't have it :eek:
Im starting to get mad because of this, so will someone please tlel whats worng and what I have to do to fix it, Thanks. :)

@Haak wrote:

Uhg, Now i got another problem!. When i try running server it opens then closes right away, omeone tlel me why it does this!? PLEASE!

item.title: Need A Bit Of Help Please. [ Anyone please ]
item.dc:creator: @Haak Haak
item.description:
@Haak wrote:

I have the JKD 6u1, And I have Java DB 10.2.20 ( If this is what I need? ) If I need a better java or somehting else, please tell me:)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 04:00:47 PM[/size][hr]I used the normale compilar also, But when i try to compile it says “The system cannot find the path specified”

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

Look in the compiler for like java 1.#.#_## and change it to 1.6.0 or 1.6.0_01 or 1.6.0_02 etc w/e one you have

item.description:
@bib wrote:

just use a regular compiler like this

@echo off title b1b5c4p3 Compiler javac *.java pause
